review: This may be the worst Apple Product I've ever owned, however; I haven't owned too many Apple products anyways.This wouldn't have been that bad, if I was able to watch it on a television with a Receiver.....it displayed a resolution of 480p on any of my HDTVs with receivers, and could not display 1280x720p/i or 1920x1080p/i either.  These problems basically renders this device unusable for me, I got a Roku Box instead, way better.Again, it worked when I plugged it in directly to my TV, but that won't work for us users that have a surround sound system.
author: Austin

review: Great item, rental of movies and tv shows is expensive but works perfect if you have Netflix which is a great option as well, I have an IPhone and a IPad Mini and has Been a great experience at least for me.I'm an Apple lover and this item works perfect if you have really good games on your IPad or IPhone, you can use them as controlls and probably with the great resolution that it has (1080P) I won't need any more my PS3 to play FIFA 2013.
author: JayC

review: Apple TV is a very typical product from the tech giant.Takes less than 5 minutes to setup once outside the box. The Apple TV integrates seamlessly with iTunes, Netflix, Huluplus, Youtube, and few other channels. It has VIMEO which has loads of videos.Compared to Roku or other boxes, Apple TV capability is limited as to the # of channels. Price is not cheap either. BUT remember, it is Apple, reliable, cool and classy and you'll love using it.
